snippet: A release said Louisville would lose one scholarship in each of the 2017-18 and 2018-19 seasons, with official recruiting visits reduced by one in 2016-17 and 2017-18.
abstract: Louisville says it will forfeit two future men's basketball scholarships and reduce recruiting visits, adding to self-imposed punishment which included earlier postseason ban, in wake of alleged sex scandal.
lead_paragraph: A release said Louisville would lose one scholarship in each of the 2017-18 and 2018-19 seasons, with official recruiting visits reduced by one in 2016-17 and 2017-18.
